original_body_lines: The price of Litro domestic LP gas cylinders have been increased with effect from today (January 01, 2024), the Chairman of Litro Gas Muditha Peiris announced.
Accordingly, the price of the 12.5 kg cylinder has been increased by Rs. 685 to Rs. 4,250 while the price of the 05 kg cylinder has been increased by Rs. 276 to Rs. 1,707.
Meanwhile, the price of the 2.3 kg cylinder has been hiked by Rs. 127 with the new price of Rs. 795.
